MiningDisc: Buy and store POE - get Wh
ScreenLoader1: Buy and store POE - get Wh
PoePowerDisc1: POE - your power source 1 POE = 10 W (per hour)
PoePowerDisc2: Connect the wallet, the POE in the wallet generates power in the background and charges the battery. Save Wh, they can be used in the future
PoePowerUp1: To increase the power of your energy source, connect a wallet, buy POE and keep them in your wallet
PoePowerUp2: 1 POE generates in background 10 W (per hour)
BatteryDisc1: The battery is charged by POE and generator
BatteryDisc2: Don't forget to collect energy from the battery to balance, the battery capacity is indicated below, this is the limit of its charging!
GeneratorDisc2: The generator has its own resource, it is indicated below, it is gradually restored
NotEnoughBalance2: Accumulate more Wh: connect a wallet and buy POE or spin up a generator
FullBattery2: Transfer energy to your balance by clicking the Collect button
LowGenerator2: Wait until it cools down or raise its level
MultitabUp1: Increase the number of clicks per click
